data.message: Eminem is a good rapper and all, but I'm really tired of his "soldier" bullshit. You're not a soldier by any meaning of the word dude.

replies.message:
He may not be a soldier in uniform but any one who fights an addiction & come out the other side with their shit still intact is (in my eyes) still a soldier. Except it's a harsher war as yourself is the enemy and friend. 

Bigger picture dude. We all in a battle somewhere along the lines.

Well that's your opinion I guess. Soldier has a different meaning in my eyes. Someone who fights addiction and wins is strong no doubt, but not a soldier. He dug himself a hole with addiction, and good for him for crawling out, but let's not forget that with all the money he has, he had a lot of hands helping to get him out of that hole.
Eminem is wearing an air force uniform anyways.
